thread.title: Samsung marketing division eyes acquisitions in India
thread.title_full: Samsung marketing division eyes acquisitions in India

title: Samsung marketing division eyes acquisitions in India
text:
Samsung marketing division eyes acquisitions in India 
Times Of India Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Cheil Worldwide is looking at acquiring multiple agencies in India's advertising technology space as the marketing company from the Samsung group seeks to build digital capabilities in a country that it ranks as a priority market, ahead of even China....
